bots.name: SMART MACHINE
bots.description: AI's all the rage, but it's no threat to you. You can't resist a good puzzle, and your brain seems to be an endless repository of random facts. You play chess, and you're considering taking up bridge. Your favorite â€œsocial mediaâ€ used to be Quora, but these days, you mostly spend your time on Reddit and donate your smarts to ChatGPT.
bots.fatalFlaw: Leaving too many nits on PRs

bots.name: PHILOSOPHER BOT
bots.description: What exactly is a robot? Does free will exist? Is a bump sensor a camera? These are the questions that keep you up at night. You're constantly asking "why," coming up with new theories about the things around you, and resisting the urge to say "ontology" over lunch. You love nothing more than a good conversation, except maybe an accurate alignment chart.
bots.fatalFlaw: Asking "is a hot dog a sandwich?" too many times

bots.name: ARTSY BOT
bots.description: You're charming, open-minded, and full of spunk. You've made multi-course meals with snacks and ingredients from the kitchen. You are an innovator, you're constantly pushing things to the edge. You enjoy being slightly intimidating, and you are secretly pleased when people respond "I've never heard of that."
bots.fatalFlaw: Your room is always a mess

bots.name: GHOST BOT
bots.description: You're a lurker. You love spying on people's phones on the subway. You don't talk much, but you're on top of all the gossip, all the time. You're a self-starter, independent, and self-reliant. Somehow, you get everything done without any struggle â€“ it's otherworldly. It's almost like you've lived this life once before.

bots.name: SPICY BOT
bots.description: What would lunchtime be without you? With you around, there's never an awkward silence. You love nothing more than a good debate â€“ you even have a list of "hot takes" in your notes app. Your life is never boring. You're always down to do it for the plot. And boy, that plot sure is thickening every day.

bots.name: PARTY BOT
bots.description: The party don't start 'til you walk inâ€¦ You've got the best playlist, the best energy, and of course â€“ the best moves. You're constantly hosting, and you love nothing more than a good theme. You wouldn't be super useful on a stranded island, but everybody would want you there anyway. Karaoke anyone?

bots.name: COZY BOT
bots.description: You are the physical embodiment of a cup of hot cocoa. Always at ease, you are the calm center of the office. You're a mom friend, you're always taking care of the people around you. You sign off emails with â€œwarmly,â€ and you always seem to have a smile on your face. You have plants in your room and they're all thriving â€“ no plant-watering robot needed.

bots.name: SHORT-CIRCUIT BOT
bots.description: Let's be honest, you're not always doing your best work. But when you are, you're electric! Your comments often catch everyone by surprise. When the inspiration hits, it's impossible to stop the flow. You'd be a Tiktok hit, undoubtedly iconic. If only you knew how to make videosâ€¦

bots.name: BARBIE BOT
bots.description: You genuinely love life, and your enthusiasm is contagious. You feel alive in the spotlight, and you're (not so secretly) dying to be featured in a man on the street interview. Every outfit of yours is a hit, so obviously you post a mirror selfie on Instagram on the daily. You know girlboss is supposed to be ironic these days, but you're not sure why and you're too afraid to ask.
bots.superpower: Never has a bad hair day

questions.question: How are you feeling today?
options: Good! Ready to take on the day!
None of the above. I contain multitudes

questions.question: If you could grant a robot any ability, what would you choose?
options: Follow me around like an imprinted duckling

My wizard amulet would be made ofâ€¦
You've been invited to a tool party (a party for tools). Which tool do you bring?
The wizard is conjuring a generative stew. Quick, grab something from the kitchen to add!
